name: sacred-fire
caption: Sacred Fire

effect.short: Has a 50% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 50% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.  [Frozen]{mechanic:frozen} Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

flavorText:
The target is razed with a mystical fire of great
intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
